Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>、おまえはトーマの言う事を 本当に信じていたのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <Hilda>, do you really believe what Tohma told you?

Entry.JapaneseText: 純粋な<Yellow>ヒト<White>の身体が手に入るって事……？ ……今だって信じてるわ。
Entry.EnglishText: That I can attain the body of a pure <Yellow>Human<White>? ...I still believe that I can.

Entry.JapaneseText: 世界は広いのよ。ただトーマが知らなかっただけで、 そんな方法がないとは言い切れないでしょ。
Entry.EnglishText: This world is vast. Even if Tohma doesn't know how, you can't just say that a way to do so doesn't exist.

Entry.JapaneseText: それを探しながら生きていくのも 悪くないって、思うけど。
Entry.EnglishText: I don't think it's wrong to spend my life in pursuit of that.

Entry.JapaneseText: 世界は広い……ハーフであるおまえの身の上を 受け入れてくれる人々もいるかもしれないぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: The world <Italic>is</Italic> vast... Perhaps there are those who would be able to accept you for who you are as a Half.
